## Bio

Rodney Dyer is currently serving as the Director of the [Center for Environmental Studies](https://ces.vcu.edu) at [Virginia Commonwealth University](https://vcu.edu).  His research laboratory focuses on developing tools to better understand how the physical configuration of natural and modified landscapes impact genetic connectivity for native and introduced species. 

## Education

2002 - PhD Biology - University of Missouri Saint Louis
1998 - MS Biology - University of Missouri Saint Louis
1996 - BS Biology - Western Washington University
1994 - AA General - Seattle Central Community College
